column4: Which file GRUB uses to read for booting time? Reading my /boot/grub/menu.lst I saw Ubuntu 8.10 entries, but they are not listed on GRUB booting screen? Please help :-(
it uses /boot/grub/menu.lst you sure you were not reading comments by mistake?
I also install Kubunt 7.10 on an other partition, this is my running OS: /boot/grub/menu.lst But GRUB doest not use that file on booting screen.
if you have sevarl linux disrtos installed.. you should pick one to controll the boot loader. and learn to manually configure grub.
